For people who dont know this is the original unreal tournament: It is, but its the GOTY edition. It has some extras and afaik is inmediatly patched up to 436 no delta. For those who want a no cd crack, there is non needed. But fi you do get that problem, here's a legit patch released by epic games them selfs that allows for play without the need for a CD: http://downloads.unrealadmin.org/UnrealTournament/Patches/Windows/utpatch436nodelta.exe
